resources.string: Recipe Book

Pasta
Cream Cheese
Parmesan Cheese
Olive Oil
Garlic
Salt Pepper

Cook your pasta until al dente
Saute garlic in olive oil until fragrant
Add cream cheese, pasta cooking water, parmesan, and stir well
Drain and add pasta to the skillet
Toss until well combined, adding some pasta water if needed
Maggi Noodles\nWater\nMaggi Masala

Add one and a half cup of water
Add maggi noodles and boil it
Add the maggi masala to it
Wait for 2 mins
Maggi is ready!

Flour
Sugar
Eggs
Butter
Baking Powder

Preheat oven to 180°C
Mix all ingredients together until smooth
Pour into a baking tin and bake for 25-30 minutes
Allow to cool before serving

Flour
Milk
Eggs
Sugar
Baking Powder

Mix all ingredients together to form a batter
Heat a pan over medium heat
Pour the batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form
Flip and cook until golden brown
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice

Pizza Dough
Tomato Sauce
Mozzarella Cheese
Pepperoni
Olive Oil

Preheat oven to 220°C
Spread tomato sauce over the pizza dough
Add cheese and toppings
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly

Ground Beef
Burger Buns
Lettuce
Tomato
Cheese
Condiments
Form the ground beef into patties\nGrill the patties until fully cooked\nAssemble the burger with buns, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and condiments of choice
Potatoes\nOil\nSalt

Cut potatoes into thin strips
Heat oil in a deep fryer
Fry potatoes until golden and crispy
Drain on paper towels and season with salt
